text: tannalute nathaneat bhakti pularttiyavar svargattilekk kuttankuttamayi nayikkappetum. annane avaravite ettumpeal atinre vatilukal avarkkayi turannuveccavayayirikkum. atinre kavalkkar areatu parayum: "ninnalkku samadhanam. ninnalkku nallatu varatte. sthiravasikalayi ninnalitil pravesiccukealluka
